import React from 'react'; import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { chooseTrans } from '../ticketsState'; const TicketsFilter = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const selectTrans = (e) => { dispatch(chooseTrans(e.target.id.substring(6))); } return (

    КОЛИЧЕСТВО ПЕРЕСАДОК

    КОМПАНИЯ

) } export default TicketsFilter;
